rules_text:
As this land enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
flavor_text: [i]The Archive's greatest secrets are hidden behind puzzles, so that all can experience the joy of discovering them.[/i]
notes:
if common: Mysterious Archive

The Archive is a school of all subjects, and a nest of puzzles. Every surface is part of some clue or game.

name overlap: Flooded Morass (DOV), Cryptic Reef (CCR)
